0.1.name: wordpress/smtp-cycle-email
0.1.description:
If you need paid support to get this plugin installed or to have a customized version of the plugin please send us an email to this address contact@cybernetikz.com.

Using this plugins, you can send email to different user using various smtp server with spinning text feature. You can set cron job from cpanel to send email automatically from you server, using your-domain/wp-content/plugins/smtp-cycle-email/cron.php this file.

Main key feature for this plugins

  • SMTP servers to send email
  • Use SMTP servers cycle wise
  • Spinning text to generate dynamic content
  • Set cron job to send schedule email

There is a publicly accessible web page file which triggers the cron script every 5 minutes. You can use webcron.org or cpanel to set cron job to simply load the page. The page, when loaded, just grabs the "scheduled" email that is to
